name: Grapples to Grapples
description:
Controls - 

Mouse: Aim Camera

Left-Click: click and hold to start grappling, release left click to stop grappling.

Right-Click (while holding left click): "lock" your grappling hook to make tighter turns around objects.

WASD: Move player

Space: Jump

R: Reset level

Play a level after completing it to see your previous best time for the level and aim for a faster time!

I've been working on this game for a couple of months and several hundred hours so I'm looking for feedback.  This is my largest game to date, I would love to keep working on it and would really appreciate hearing your thoughts on it so far!

Downloadable version will likely run a bit better.   This is still a demo version and levels, scores, etc. are still likely to be changed.

Mac and Linux downloadable versions will be added shortly.   Currently the downloadable version is the same as the in-browser version, but I plan to mostly add to the downloadable version(s).

Price could potentially go up to about $5 as I near a final version.
